examples.example: 我提前到车站买票，以便能顺利踏上愉快的旅程。

translate.english: I arrive at the station in advance to buy tickets so as to embark on a pleasant journey smoothly.

examples.example: 我们提前去排队买票，期待着接下来精彩的演出。

translate.english: We went to queue up to buy tickets in advance, looking forward to the wonderful performance next.

examples.example: 我早早地去排队买票，准备去观看那场期待已久的精彩球赛。

translate.english: I went to queue up early to buy tickets, preparing to watch that highly anticipated wonderful football game.
